var newmsg = { "payload" : { "state" : { "temperature" : parseFloat(msg.payload) } }, "acknowledge" : true };

return newmsg;

name: convert relay_state
convert relay_state
OSL, F채lle der letzten 7 Tage pro 100k Einwohner
Berlin, F채lle der letzten 7 Tage pro 100k Einwohner
Brandenburg, F채lle der letzten 7 Tage pro 100k Einwohner

func:
msg.topic="SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(MIN(Zeitpunkt) - MOD(MIN(Zeitpunkt), 100))*1000 as Stunde, date_format( Zeitpunkt, '%Y-%m-%d %H' ) as DatumStunde, MIN(Total), MAX(Total), ROUND((MAX(Total) - Min(Total)), 2) as `KWHproStunde` FROM `Sensor` GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(Zeitpunkt,'%Y-%m-%d %H') ORDER BY Stunde DESC LIMIT 24"
return msg;

msg.topic=
"\
SELECT \
    FROM_UNIXTIME((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`Zeitpunkt`) DIV (60 * 60 * 24)) * (60 * 60 * 24)) Stunde, \
    ROUND(AVG(Current), 2) AS CurrentAVG, \
    /*ROUND(MIN(Total), 2), \
    ROUND(MAX(Total), 2),*/ \
    ROUND((MAX(Total) - MIN(Total)), 2) AS `KWHproStunde` \
FROM \
    Sensor \
GROUP BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`Zeitpunkt`) DIV (60 * 60 * 24) \
ORDER BY Stunde DESC \
LIMIT 14 \
"
return msg;

name: Keller
func:
var newMsg = { payload: msg.payload.station.prices.e10.toFixed(2) };
return newMsg;
